name: Satyendra Rajbhar
title: Full Stack Developer | Angular & Node.js Enthusiast
short_bio: Building modern web applications with Angular, Node.js, and scalable backend solutions.
about: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with a BCA degree and strong expertise in Angular, Node.js, TypeScript, and modern frontend frameworks. I enjoy building scalable, responsive, and user-friendly web applications. With hands-on experience across the full software development lifecycle, I thrive on turning ideas into working products.

projects.title: Task Manager App
projects.description: A project management tool to create, assign, and track tasks in real-time.
projects.long_description: Built with Angular (frontend) and Node.js/Express (backend). It supports authentication, CRUD operations, project categorization, and role-based access.

projects.title: E-Commerce Store
projects.description: An online shopping platform with cart, checkout, and payment integration.
projects.long_description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce store with Angular frontend, Node.js backend, and Razorpay payment gateway integration.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my work and skills.
projects.long_description: Designed and developed a responsive portfolio website using Angular and Angular Material with theme toggle support.

projects.title: Blog Platform
projects.description: A blogging platform with markdown support and authentication.
projects.long_description: Created a full-stack blogging app where users can write, edit, and publish blogs. Includes JWT-based authentication and comment system.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A real-time weather forecast app with location-based data.
projects.long_description: Developed an Angular PWA that fetches live weather data using OpenWeather API and supports offline caching.
